website_summaries.verdict: Focuses on delivering the maximum amount of protein per serving without adding carbs and sugars.
pros: When you want to build muscle and recover faster after workouts, you’ll appreciate the 25 grams of protein per serving
If you’re also trying to lose weight, this coconut-flavored powder has no sugar or fat and less than 1 gram of carbs per serving
Easier to digest than some other whey protein powders
cons: Some people don’t like the texture

customer_reviews.title: I recived half of jar ....
customer_reviews.text: think the price is not right for the quantity, the taste is Excellent and the formula too... but the price is just not right One person found this helpful
customer_reviews.author: belkin pineda

customer_reviews.title: Was there a change in the formula / method / quality of the product the last months ?
customer_reviews.text: Sascha! I’ve been buying this protein since the beginning. Same flavor , chocolate. The last that I bought this Jan 2018 tastes so much as MILK that I couldn’t tolerate it. Did you change the formula?? Please, change I back to the original!!!! And let us know that you aknowledge the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Garces

customer_reviews.title: Did you change the formula?
customer_reviews.text: Hello sascha. This is the third time that I bought your protein, the first time i tried chocolate flavor, the second time i bought vanilla (my favorite) and this time I bought the chocolate flavor but there is something wrong because I’m not feeling good after drink it. It makes my stomach hurt. I drank it with almond milk and then i tried with water and the same thing keeps happening to me. Did you change the formula? I’m a hug fan, I hope you can answer my comment
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the flavor at all.
customer_reviews.text: I love Sascha and her concept. I was really happy about trying her whey protein but I did not tolerate the flavor. It was too way sweet. Then, I try to cook with it but everything was too sweet as well. All my family thinks the same so I spent the money without obtaining anything... I recommend the vendor to have the posibility of samples. That would really help.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: ... and ordered the unflavoured version hoping it would taste like anything you add to it as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered two of the chocolate powders (love it) and one peanut butter (like it but wouldn't buy again) and ordered the unflavoured version hoping it would taste like anything you add to it as advertised. This isn't the case!!!!I not matter what you add (cacao, coffee or matcha) you could still taste the powder and it isn't good at all. I would request a return if I hadn't had it shipped to the UK by my mother in law as unfortunately I had to buy in the US as none of these shakes are no longer available here in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Ina

customer_reviews.title: very dishonest quantity :(
customer_reviews.text: I just received my whey protein and the pot is practically in the middle. I was quite excited but what a disappointment I've been to seeing that protein does not come so full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Extreme fake sweetener taste... I tried both peanut butter and cookies & cream, same experience with both. I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: valmore

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like it, I wouldn’t buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sascha protein for the first time (I love sascha fitness, so I decided to buy it) I bought it a week ago and I had a very bad experience, it is too sweet and it causes me nauseas and stomach pain, (this had never happened with the other proteins that I have tried) I do not know if they have changed the formula or there is something in the ingredients that has caused this, please I request a refund of my money, I am not interested in continuing to consume it because it hurts my health and neither I am willing to lose my money.
customer_reviews.author: William M Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I tried the chocolate protein and it is delicious ! It helps with hunger control , has low sodium , aids with the digestive system throughout the day. I am for sure going to re-buy ! I highly recommend this to anyone trying to lose weight, or maintain weight or gain muscle mass. Excellent for woman because it helps control hormones. Absolutely love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I love Sacha, and I follow her on Instagram, youtube, so I decided to buy her protein. I think if you look only the "nutritional factor" of this protein, is awesome, but unfortunately, I can't drink it! So sweet, if I use more water, is like drink water with sugar. I'm sad to say that for me was the most Disgusting flavor. I'm trying to use it to bake some muffins, with oats, and almond flour, cacao and vanilla essence to take away the awful flavor..
customer_reviews.author: Yami

customer_reviews.title: Simply a scam
customer_reviews.text: The product might be great but I pay for a full container not half I going to returned this is basically a scam, I will not pay a full price for a half a bottle of the product very disappointed and it was highly recommended 🤔😡
customer_reviews.author: bertony torres

customer_reviews.title: Wayyy too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the vanilla flavor thinking it would be more neutral compared to other flavors( I guess the unflavored one would’ve been better). I usually mix the protein with fruit to make a smoothie and I haven’t had problems with other brands I use (that use sugars) but hers is so sweet I couldn’t even drink the smoothie. I even got a headache from how sweet it was. Even though her protein is more consciously made compared to the ones I’ve tried in the past, I would not purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Coconut is AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The coconut flavor is the most delicious, creamy thing I have ever tasted. AMAZING, AMAZING. However I cannot give this 5 stars because prior to me trying the coconut flavor, I purchased the Strawberry and it is dreadful. It has no flavor whatsoever and it's a watery mess no matter how much you put in your mixture, hence this product is overall inconsistent as some flavors are great while others are a disaster. I will continue buying the coconut one for years to come, however I advise everyone to stay away from the Strawberry flavor. I'm excited to try Cookies & Cream next :)
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Yucky taste.
customer_reviews.text: Weird sweet, chemical taste. Bleh. Much prefer BSN Syntha blends.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus T. Firefly

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product but too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the chocolate and peanut butter protein. In general, I think that is a great quality product, I was using another brand before so I could compare. I feel it helps me to recover faster when I train hard, and It prevents me to reach dinner feeling hangry when I used it as an afternoon snack. I'm not that into sweet though, so for me, it is a bit too sweet. I would love if Sascha could launch a not that sweet edition of her proteins, for those like me that love her products but would like the option to add the stevia at home.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: Blew my Mind.....Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: No games, no gimmick. Now I'm wondering if this is actually Protein powder or just plain chocolate milk. I am not a chocolate fan, i ordered it by mistake as i really wanted the strawberry, but i have no regret really cant believe how good this taste with just water. Looking on the ingredients i think its fair to say this is a very clean protein powder. I did research it before buying and im glad i did. Another important thing is that it does not hurt my stomach any at all. I have acid refulx and this protein powder goes down easily and stays down. Highly recommended, cant wait to drink some more.
customer_reviews.author: Alexxus

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the chocolate flavor and had high hopes for this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to received this protein . I absolutely love the chocolate flavor and had high hopes for this one, but I just can’t stand this flavor (vanilla) . Its a little too sweet, but I’m fine with that the thing that I cannot stand is that it has a horrible aftertaste. I can’t stand it. So dissapointed 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Patricia s.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor not as advertised. Made me have stomach discomfort.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE! Not what I was expecting. The flavor is more like a bland artificial Caramel instead of Dulce de Leche/Arequipe as advertised. Disgusting! The smell is extremely strong and artificial. It made my stomach hurt. I did try it for a few days. I thought this can't be possible. I know the Coconut one is excellent and I have no issues with that flavor at all. But this new flavor makes me nauseous. The more I had the worse it made me feel. Just the thought of it now makes me sick. Too bad cause I was extremely excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the consistency is very creamy I love It! Buuutt the only down fault Wich is ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I gave this protein shake a 3 star before because I did find it over sweet! tasted is delicious,consistency is creamy it literally taste like a chocolate milk shake,so what I do now is 1 cup of unsweetened almond milk,1/4 cup of water,1frozen banana,2 tbs of ground flaxseed and 4 to 5 ice cubes,and guess what it is no longer over sweet! All I had to do was put a little extra liquid.I’m in love with this protein shake,so far is the best one I’ve ever had,cant wait to try the other flavors,I highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Omg this is what I’m talking about !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best protein I ever had taste delicious omg the coconut is amazingggggggg if you mix with pineapple feels like drinking a pina colada even want to put a little rum lol just kidding... overall great product recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: So yummy! Would totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried vanilla and now the coconut flavor, and both are delicious. Coconut is my favorite. Tried many different protein powders In the past and Sashas protein powder is by far the best one. No fake sugar aftertaste. The vanilla Flavor is a bit more sweet than the coconut flavor. Very tasty and I feel satisfied after having my shakes. I use unsweetened almond milk 6-8 oz, ice, 6-8 oz of water and usually half a banana or cocoa or a 1 tsp of PB with my vanilla shake and pineapple with the coconut... for real... it’s so yummy and filling.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Sweet. Good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different kinds of proteins but I always go back to sascha's. They are sweet. To me it taste great! My husband thinks is way too sweet but for him I just make half scoop in the moring and half at the end of the day so that way he gets his one scoop a day with unsweetened almond milk and it tastes great. Coconut flavor doesn't have a super strong coconut flavor, just enough to taste it. The bottle comes like 3/4 full. So don't be disspointed once you open her protein bottles because that's the way they package them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Butler

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Caramel flavor is delicious! I love the taste of this protein! It’s not that sweet or have any after taste to it. It’s just like drinking a milk shake, I add some almond milk to it! Yum yum! Totally worth it, also it came faster than I thought, cuz it said it was out of stock when I purchased it.. cant wait to try it mix with the chocolate flavor :D!! Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffpad

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Taste amazing !! So creamy ! Best protein that I have ever tried! Sabor increíble! Súper cremosa ! La mejor proteína que he probado!!
customer_reviews.author: Julieta

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know what happen with my order :(. In the past I tried this product (Chocolate Protein) and it tasted amazing. This time it wasn't. As usually I prepared the protein with water and inmedially as I tried, I felt the huge different in the flavor (beyond all bearing) and the texture (not creamy). My sister in-low said that maybe was a problem with the "lote"?? I don't know!. At the end I had to returned the product.
customer_reviews.author: MoBerry🍒

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive tummy
customer_reviews.text: So I'm very sensitive, gluten free and dairy free... Also, my stomach is extremely sensitive to any weird food or drink is not natural... and this protein felt PERFECT, didn't bother me at all, no gases, no nothing, it's just delicious, light, helps to my digestion (which I never thought it could) but its simply GREAT! I loved it, its super sweet! 100% recommended!! people with a sensitive stomach or digestion system will love it! Can't wait to try another flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Aura Isabel Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Reality of vainilla flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I like the flavor however it is very very very sweet. I would like to try the coconut flavor. My husband didn’t like it much either, he asked me to buy the one with not flavor. I haven’t experienced any cream texture that some people talk about, an less is mixed in cows milk, which I did for my son. But if it is mixed in water or any other almond/coconut milk, don’t expect creamy texture at all. It is just a myth!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: I loooove this protein BUT!
customer_reviews.text: Hi Sascha Fitness team, I have been your client for over a year and I love all your products, but this time I'm unhappy with my protein. I ordered it last week, it was delivered last Saturday and I opened it today, for the first time since I have been buying your proteins I was surprised to find a weird brown ball inside the container. I would really appreciate an explanation, can I consume it without any problem or I need to return the product?
customer_reviews.author: Maria Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This protein powder tastes amazing! Out of all the flavors chocolate is my favorite. It’s not overly sweet or tasteless, it has a strong chocolate flavor and perfect sweetness level. It tastes amazing by itself. You can mix it with water or for a creamier consistency mix with almond or coconut milk. You can also mix it with fruits like frozen strawberries or cherries... it is simply delicious! It’s hydrolyzed so it will not feel heavy... give it a try, you will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: crisch

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited with this Protein I am a fan of Sascha so i was quite crazy to taste this and the coconut flavor because she mention them a lot. Unfortunately this was a fail for me the Caramel flavor is super sweet in my opinion even If i put more ml of water still super sweet, in the other hand i just can talk beautiful about Coconut flavor, that is a brilliant taste! If you are not a fan of super sweet avoid it
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Some issues concern me but I still believe it is one of the cleanest protein out there
customer_reviews.text: Arrived pretty fast! I really like the taste but it is so sweet so keep in mind of that. There are certain things that concern me. Some of these are: As soon as I drink it. It causes me allergy my glottis starts to swallow and I don’t know why... Reviewing the ingredients I can’t understand this issue. Another thing that happens it is makes me burps. Even though I still believe this protein it is one of the cleanest that I found! So that’s why I gave this stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely flavor. Chocolatilicious. Super cool to digest!
customer_reviews.text: I got the chocolate one. The flavor is amazing to be a stevia protein which I dont like much but still is freaking delicious. It's even better with lactose free milk. Is hard for us lactose intolerant guys to find those proteins without lactose but as always sascha is a wonderful nutritionist and the science and knowledge she has is excelent in the ways of nutrition science. Would definelty buy it again. Flavor, good presentation and you get what you pay for. Almost forgot, freaking nice to digest! One of the fewest proteins that has digestive enzymes!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Lira

customer_reviews.title: Best protein!
customer_reviews.text: I love Sascha Fitness and I LOVE her protein products. Chocolate and Caramel flavors are the best. I have also bought strawberry and coconut but they aren’t my favorite. The strawberry tasted like the Nesquick a little too sweet for me but if you like that flavor, you might like e strawberry protein powder. The coconut one, didn’t really taste like anything. It tasted more like vanilla. Whichever your flavor you buy, the protein powder by itself has good nutrition facts. And it has been the first protein powder that fits my fitness goals
customer_reviews.author: Dennise Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Best protein ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have used GMC protein powders for quite sometime and since I have seen Sacha’s YouTube channel I’ve become a fan and was eager to purshase her protein, and I was not disappointed. It tastes AMAZING! Fast shipping, great protein quality. Perfect as a smoothie or in pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: I know every body is different. So with that being said my experience with this protein was horrible, I had a week of stomachache, diarrhea and developed acne. I just wanted to try Sascha’s product. This one didn’t work for me but I absolutely love fit 9.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Maria Osuna

customer_reviews.title: HEAVEN
customer_reviews.text: This protein is HEAVEN to me! I've been looking for a chocolate protein that didn't make me want to throw up and I finally found it!!! The flavor is just perfect, all I ever wanted; you're my hero Sascha! I'm definitely buying more right now.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Versatile use. Tasty flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I got the salted caramel flavor, and it’s probably one of the best tasting protein powders I’ve tried to date. Additionally, it mixes pretty well. I’ve used it in a lot of frozen fruit smoothies. On its own with ice and a frozen banana, it basically is like eating guilt-free ice cream! I love that it doesn’t have any carbs, and is a great way for me to meet my macros at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sinbin

customer_reviews.title: They all have been great, this is one of the best proteins I ...
customer_reviews.text: I made it a mission to try all of the flavors.. so far I have tried all of them but the vanilla one. They all have been great, this is one of the best proteins I have ever tried. I am lactose intolerant and this products has never given me any kind of stomach problems, also it never makes me bloated or anything. My favorite flavor was peanut butter and cookies n cream! but I suggest you try them all, they are all pretty good. The Strawberry one was a little bit too sweet for me but other than that they are all delicious and blend very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: The protein is really good, but if you are looking for a good flavor, vanilla is not the one, the taste is like a fake sweet, when I smell it make me fell a little sick, and I love super sweet things. I tried mixed with strawberries, but the best way for me was making pancakes with the protein, definitely recommend this protein but I think the next one would be strawberry flavor.
customer_reviews.author: M.Ross

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, this stuff is the real deal. Have used many other products but all have lead to gassiness. This? It's all gone and the taste is very good and the results have been good. But the gas? ALL GONE! Not even what I was looking for as I figured I'd just have to deal with it. But nope! This doesn't mess with my digestion at all.
customer_reviews.author: RSQViper

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I tried this because I loved the vanilla flavor, but this one is just TOO sweet.
customer_reviews.author: NRE

customer_reviews.title: Caramel and Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: I tried chocolate and it was good but too much of a stevia taste, when I tried the peanut butter flavor I was like “this is sooo much better and I don’t think that anything can top this flavor” but when I tried the Caramel I just thought I had tried the best protein ever, doesn’t make you feel bloated, 0 carbs and 0 sugar makes it extra worth it and it satisfies and it’s creamy when you add little liquid.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: sorry I didn’t like it a lot I will keep with my ON ...
customer_reviews.text: This protein says it doesn’t have sugar but it does have stevevia and too much for my taste that I will eater have just a little bit of sugar than this stevia taste, it’s one of those taste that you get tired and it taste to fake, sorry I didn’t like it a lot I will keep with my ON protein or women’s best.
customer_reviews.author: Eliortiz89

customer_reviews.title: Peanut butter is not good
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fans of sascha I love her and o consider myself as her virtual friend... but I think she needs to put more love to this peanut butter protein... flavor is not strong as the chocolate one. ( chocolate es really GOOD, my favorite till now) so this ones taste like very watery... not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: darianna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flavors - have tried 3 of them !
customer_reviews.text: Sure I am Saschas fan from many many years. I like her thought process with food and I decided to give it a shot and try her protein. I have tried pretty much all of them, the peanut butter, strawberry and today I tasted the chocolate. I can’t remeber the last time I tried a product and I liked all of the flavors from the same brand. Holly cow so freaking delicious. I mixed it with cold almond milk and it was insanely good.
customer_reviews.author: vicente a duque

customer_reviews.title: the best protein I've used
customer_reviews.text: By far, the best protein I've used! The taste of the vanilla flavor is simply divine! The fact that it has enzymes along with stevia extract is an added bonus. The ingredients are clean and no added cheap harmful crap put in by unscrupulous owners/company can he found in this Whey Hydrolyzed Isolate protein. Bar none the BEST tasting protein. The only slight complain I have is its not from a Grass Fed cow. So this protein has antibiotic and growth hormone in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth my money
customer_reviews.text: It was very very sweet and it did leave an after taste. Wanted to like it .
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela T Paz

customer_reviews.title: Creamy goodness
customer_reviews.text: Normally, I do not like to write reviews. But this, this is a special case. I just had to sit down and write this. This protein powder (chocolate) is the best powder I have ever tasted. I've been bodybuilding for about a decade now and I've been through at least 10-20 different brands. This flavor is the only flavor that did not make me feel like I needed to throw up immediately after drinking it. I usually do 4 scoops and even then the protein shake that is the result retains its non-overwhelming chocolate creamy goodness.
customer_reviews.author: A. K.

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: I have tried: Cookies and Cream Vanilla Coconut Caramel They are all good but the flavor of the caramel protein is just WOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Raymondtahhan

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Good flavor and consistency, price is higher comparing to other brands but is due to the great ingredients used. Vote with your dollars, when you buy a product that is produced in an smaller scale you’re not only supporting entrepreneurship and diversity, you are also promoting competence that will translate in better quality/price ratio. Sascha’s products are conceived from the idea that supplementation allows you to improve your results but are not a magical trick, nor required by any means, so kuddos to Sascha for this great protein alternative. Waiting anxiously for the plant based one.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste and made me feel sick
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product by various people and I love that it claims to be so healthy but the taste is just so bad. First off, the chocolate shake is just TOO sweet and has a bad after taste. Second this made me so sick afterwards, i made it with water and it just made me feel sick. Lastly, the price is too high for a protein powder. Btw, the consistency is so liquidy it doesn’t blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to trying this, but it is too sweet. I can taste the artificial sweeteners. Will keep trying, maybe with almond milk which has less sugar than lactose free milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for 9 times and at the beginning was fine but now the price was increased a lot for sometimes half of the big bottle not worth any more
customer_reviews.author: Penguin.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little but scared when I ordered it for the first time, but now, I've got to say that is my favorite. I've tried the Vanilla one but to be honest I didn't like it at all. The taste to me is nothing compared to the chocolate one. I will definetly recommend this chocolate one!
customer_reviews.author: GUILLERMO A VILLEGAS M

customer_reviews.title: ... vanilla protein shakes and by far this is the best tasting one
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many vanilla protein shakes and by far this is the best tasting one! Creamy and delicious even with just water. I've tried the chocolate and cookies and cream but they are not as great as the vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: yadira

customer_reviews.title: No carbs, fat, sugars
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT a big fan if protein shakes in general but the coconut flavor is amazing. It feels like having an ice cream milk shake instead of protein one. I sometimes add a touch of cinnamon or a teaspoon of cocoa powder and it gets even better. Above all this is a LOW CALORIE, NO sugar, No fat, NO carbs product so it works great for those working in loosing weight. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Marisabel Eguidazu

customer_reviews.title: No scoop. Good flavor but not great
customer_reviews.text: It didn't bring any scoop which makes no sense, now I have to weight the protein each time I'm gonna make the shake. Not convenient. As for the flavor, I was honestly expecting a less artifical flavor on the coconut flavor. Sascha mentioned it taste like Venezuelan cocada, it does not. However it doesn't taste bad is not the flavor I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Perez

customer_reviews.title: It’s too sweet. I bought the vanilla flavor and I can’t ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s too sweet . I bought the vanilla flavor and I can’t even finish my drink . Now I don’t know what to do with the protein..
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate flavor. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ooohhh!!! Finally I found MY ideal whey protein!! I love it! I will buy it again and again and again....the only "bad" thing is that it was very difficult to get the chocolate flavor in Amazon!! It is always sold out!!! I tried vanilla (is very sweet, but I like it so much), strawberry (I won't buy it, I don't like it) and chocolate...and chocolate flavor is...OMG SO GOOD! It is the best flavor that I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rosi89

customer_reviews.title: Great product ingrediens-wise.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product ingredients wise. I compared it to similar product on the market and this one had better quality ingredients - zero carbs, sugar, fat and its low in sodium. However, it is SWEETENED WITH 100% STEVIA. So the STEVIA AFTER TASTE is THERE! so.... up to you . Hope you like the Stevia taste!
customer_reviews.author: maria ximena zamora

customer_reviews.title: The flavor is not my favorite, but they are of the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Caramel was not my favorite flavor, it is very strong for my taste. Chocolate was delicious. The ingredients are of the best quality. Surely you find better flavors in other brands, I have tried proteins with better flavor, but Sasha's are of the highest quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: I have to mix it with unsweetened cocoa powder to make it work and diminish its ultra sweet taste. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: While I appreciate the high quality of this product, I'm not a fan of the taste of Stevia. I have to mix it with unsweetened cocoa powder to make it work and diminish its ultra sweet taste. Otherwise, I'm sure anyone who doesn't mind the Stevia taste would give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tsyr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this whey protein 🤗 Flavour is soooooo good!!! I can drink the scoop with plain water and NOTHING else!!!! It tastes delicious, I was suffering that here in Jamaica I couldn’t get it but I found a courier that ship me the package and is really awesome cause finally I got my WP!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy G.

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly good!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the BEST protein I’ve ever had!!!! Wow the flavor is so good!!!! I tried Caramel and chocolate and they’re both delicious! I even mixed them together and Oh My Goodness!!! I hate to say all this because now everyone is going to buy it and it’s already hard to find .... but way to go sascha!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby Aparicio

customer_reviews.title: Not Arequipe!
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations... it is just meh. It’s pricey and definitely not buying again. It was advertised as “dulce de leche-arequipe “ flavor but it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Mafe Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. It tastes delicious and it doesn’t taste like medicine as others. This flavor is really good because you can play with it. For example, one day I add coconut milk, banana and peanut butter, another day I add strawberries and almond milk and that way I don’t get bored having just one flavor. You won’t regret buying this protein!! And also, I LOVE SACHA!!!! She is awesome!! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Ortega

customer_reviews.title: You need his in your life
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, all Sascha Fitness products are just perfect . Perfect flavor, perfect protein for anything or anybody and of course a great healthy supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Yemh_1796

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend this protein taste good and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I like it o lot the flavor it’s real good, I make my shake every time after my workout and it still taste really good. I have tried the chocolate 🍫 one is good to.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: was excited to try this and when I drank it it tasted like dirt. added bannana and skinny syrup and still was blah. returned product and picked up something at gnc.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Best protein ever
customer_reviews.text: I love sascha and every product that she makes, i think this protein is perfect for me, i try to eat less sugar and the flavor is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking forward to this protein, honestly I didn’t like it, it’s too sweet and weird taste , and it makes me got nauseas, I really like Sasha and my expectations were so high, it’s a Big No.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Tastes delicious
customer_reviews.text: Controls my cravings. I saw a difference in my muscle recovering from training and growing FASTER vs not using the protein. I mix this vanilla flavor with almond milk and can create different flavors : add TB Spoon Peanut butter or Fruit or Cocoa Powder or Almond butter or Cinnamon or spinach, avocado, lemon, and ginger. Hmmm delicioso!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like Caramel, but the flavor isn't there
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this flavor just because it is really hard to replicate. I do love Sascha and her products, and I honestly think this protein tasted ok, but is nothing close to Caramel or Dulce de Leche like it was promised. However, if you add other stuff to the mix it tastes really good. I added peanut butter and it was delicious! Just by itself is ok, nothing crazy. Again! I love Sascha, but this is just my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: It taste very good. It’s a good flavor. I love it because it’s not something you find at a store. It has helped me with appetite suppressant. I already tasted the coconut one and it’s very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Parra

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with proteins again!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to didn't like these proteins because of flavor and quality; however, I LOVE SASCHA WHEY PROTEIN. This product is what I was missing in my life. It's so smooth, delicious, creamy and with a wonderful quality which is the most important part. I'm definitely adding this flavor, caramel and vanilla to my buy again list. I highly recommend this product if you're not only looking for high quality protein but deliciousness.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS......100% RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: The best protein I have tasted. It's delicious. 100% recommended. I ordered the coconut and caramel, they are both delicious. Natural flavor. My next order will be chocolate 😍😍😍😋😋😋 Esta proteina de Sascha es la mejor proteina que he provado. Su sabor es natural. 100% recomendada. Esta deliciosa, ordene la de coco y caramelo y me facinan. Mi siguiente favor sera chocolate. 😍😍😍😋😋😋
customer_reviews.author: Ana Dimas

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality product
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many whey protein brands and all them make me feel bloated. This Whey protein has an excellent process with a high quality standard for premium proteins. What I like better from other brands, has some digestive enzymes that make you tolerate better the protein, also has an incredible taste with low calories using stevia and the last part cost benefits, I think has reasonable price compared with others. Highly satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Marco M.

customer_reviews.title: Even unflavored was not a good taste
customer_reviews.text: The taste of this left a nasty, soapy, chemically taste no matter what I mixed with it. This my first time trying whey hydrolyzed isolate from normal concentrate, but it just left a weird flavor in my mouth, will not be buying again. Also, it didn’t even come with a scoop
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: So delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! I usually stay away from protein shakes because they normally have a weird taste to me, and I had not found one that I felt was satisfying! This one is excellent in taste, it’s versatile (I add nut butter to mine or a shot of espresso!) and the taste is amazing! Have not had any issues with breakouts, bloating or anything like that. Great for post work outs!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think it was going to be this good!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about everyone saying the flavor was so good, but it totally lives up to the hype. Vanilla tastes like vanilla ice cream!
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Molero

customer_reviews.title: Best. Protein. Shake. Period.
customer_reviews.text: I was never a fan of protein shakes until I tried this. This is simply the highest quality and purest brand out there. The flavors are so good they can easily be mistaken by a dessert or cheat meal. I usually mix mine with one or two tbsp of peanut butter, 6oz of almond milk and some Enlightened Vanilla ice cream and get a creamy smoothie packed w healthy fat and protein and less than 9g of carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Karla G.

customer_reviews.title: Way too sweet..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know why I bought this flavor, I just can’t with the sweetness of all the flavored proteins. It is really expensive for the amount, so I guess I wasted my money, again. The only one I really like is the unflavored one, is the best.
customer_reviews.author: SARA ALVAREZ

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and taste. Keep buying others flavors. I drink my protein after workout and it feels so good because it give me and extra energy and keep me without eating for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Overpowering stevia after taste
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this product but couldn’t stand the stevia after taste in my mouth. I have eliminated sugar from my diet, and don’t use any artificial sweeteners at all. I occasionally use xilitol or organic maple syrup. As much as I wanted to like this product I had to return it. Do you make a version without stevia? If you did I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: ridalgo

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this protein! I am lactose in tolerance and this one my body can tolerate really well!! love the taste and everything about it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Molina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Sasha Fitness whey protein. Love the vanilla, it’s taste so good With fruis. Let’s see if next time I get another flavor. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn

customer_reviews.title: Delicious smart choice protein
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write many reviews but seriously this has been one my favorite proteins. It disolves nicely and you don’t have that powdery or protein after taste. The flavor! Omg! I want to just drink it when I am craving something a little sweet, of course I don’t, but I enjoy it a lot when I do drink it. The protein content is also a smart choice. Give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Taste  milky
customer_reviews.text: Updated: my husband is been drinking it for a week already and he love it.. if you are picky with after taste flavors I won’t recommend this flavor, go safer with the chocolate one
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca López

customer_reviews.title: I believe we pay for the brand but my wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: my wife has been trying this product for 10 days or so and she says it does its job....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: good taste, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: creamy (even mixed with only water), good taste, good quality, way less bloat feeling than other proteins that I have tried. Cons: Way too sweet, and I mean it, I like to fact that is sweeted with stevia that is good but it is overwhelming ( I have tried vanilla, chocolate, peanut butter) I really like this protein, I wish they will offer in a future a less sweet option and/or a unflavored option which is really convinient.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: I love sascha like
customer_reviews.text: I love sascha like, a lot!!! Loved the chocolate one but the peanut butter idk it tastes a little bit fake, I mix it with peanut butter and I like it. It’s not like I don’t like it but I was just waiting for something different because I know she loves peanut butter. I’m gonna but the coconut one now, I still believe in here and her products, maybe it was just this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: viridiana alcocer rivero

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is hell of good. The part that I like the most is that it has no sugar. I used it in the oatmeal and it tastes great. For being so clean the flavor is right on point, cause some of them can taste bitter or with too much cacao
customer_reviews.author: oscar l.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste really good me and my husband drink it with almond milk and a banana.
customer_reviews.author: Ingri Forero

customer_reviews.title: The absolute BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this protein since she first came up with it, I absolutely LOVE it! Strawberry it’s been my favorite it definitely tastes like nesquik either with water or almond milk it’s just great! Coconut it’s definitely my husbands favorite... I believe this is a high quality product, I’ll be a customer for as long as they sell it ;)
customer_reviews.author: Yazmin M

customer_reviews.title: Too liquid
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all the flavors and all of them are too sweet to me,and the consistency is always to liquid, it never came like a shake as others proteins that I tried. I really feel that is a reasonable price for the great ingredients that it has but I have to chance to another brand for those 2 reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Danette

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein in the Market
customer_reviews.text: Sascha is from my home town Maracaibo, I've seen her progress all this years!! Her products are really good! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Dario Morles

customer_reviews.title: Coconut is not that good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried the Chocolate and Vanilla ones and I loved them. This time I went for the Coconut one and I didn’t really like it. However I know this is the best protein in the market. Next time I will go back to my favorite flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Zuluaga

customer_reviews.title: ... for my wife and the chocolate flavor is very bad she is very fan of Sasha fitness but this ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife and the chocolate flavor is very bad she is very fan of Sasha fitness but this flavor wasn't good. Sorry Sasha!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to received this protein I got the vanilla flavor and it taste terrible. It's so sweet that I cannot stand the ...
customer_reviews.text: I admire sasha and her nutritional advice, I was so excited to received this protein I got the vanilla flavor and it taste terrible. It's so sweet that I cannot stand the horrible aftertaste. Very very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: bilbao

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I had different flavors and Love this proteins my favorite is chocolate. I’m waiting to try the new one think make me change my preferences..
customer_reviews.author: yami

product_meta.title: Sascha Fitness Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate,100% Grass-Fed (2 Pounds, All) (Caramel)
product_meta.description: Color:CaramelWhey protein comes from milk, has all the essential amino acids and is one of the best proteins in terms of quality. These are some of the benefits: Helps regenerate and increase muscle mass. Helps with fat loss while preserving muscle tissue . And also helps to control appetite and improve performance. There are mainly two types of protein: Whey Concentrate and Whey Isolate. The main difference is in their levels of purity. Whey Concentrate: is 80% protein and contains more fat and lactose which is milk sugar. Whey Isolate: is 98% protein, It's much more pure, is free of lactose and fat. We chose Whey Isolate and we hydrolyzed it to offer you an outstanding supplement. Whey hydrolyzed is predigested whey protein isolate that’s easily absorbed by your body and virtually free of any potential allergens. To further improve the quality of our product we’ve also added digestive enzymes! They can significantly improve digestion and help alleviate digestive disorders, constipation, gas and bloating. Also helps convert food into energy source. With Sascha Fitness Hydrolyzed Whey Protein Isolate we guarantee a delicious taste and one the best quality in the market. Our products are manufactured by a cGMP( Current Good Manufacturing Practice ) certified facility which is also FDA inspected .
feature_bullets: BEST QUALITY PROTEIN: 100% Isolate and Hydrolyzed GRASS-FED protein, your muscles absorbs it very fast ,it's the best kind of protein powder if you want to improve body composition. It has 25g Protein per Serving, ideal for protein synthesis and building muscle. Its High in BCAA's and EAAS, they help to protect your muscles , increase muscle mass, resistance and help with your overall hormonal environment. And it has digestive enzymes that improves digestion and prevents gas and bloating.
ZERO CARBS, SUGAR, FAT AND ITS LOW IN SODIUM, ideal if you're trying to lose fat and get very lean.

GREAT TASTE AND ITS SWEETENED WITH 100% STEVIA : The flavor of these proteins are the best, they are creamy and you are going to think you're drinking a milkshake, they are very yummy. The best part, no artificial sweeteners, it only has Stevia, a natural sweetener that won't havoc your health.
ALLERGEN FREE: Gluten Free & Lactose Free.

A NAME BEHIND THE BRAND: Sascha Fitness, a world renown fitness coach and health seeker, author of two bestseller books, gives fitness and motivation conferences around the world , she's somebody who genuinely cares about people's wellbeing, she is the cofounder and developer of these proteins and feels great responsibility towards consumers.
